r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d: A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP. It has support for HTTP transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: - Add the setSendEncoding() method and $send_encoding property to XML_RPC_Message. Request 3537. - Allow class methods to be mapped using either syntax: 'function' => 'hello::sayHello', or 'function' => array('hello', 'sayhello'), Bug 3363. - Use 8192 instead of 32768 for bytes in fread() in parseResponseFile(). Bug 3340.
